document.full_text: the red bulls will take advantage of a two-week lull in their m.l.s. schedule in late july and early august to travel to london to play in the emirates cup against arsenal.
document.title: sports briefing | soccer: red bulls to play in london this summer
lines_and_colors: the red bulls will take advantage of a two-week lull in their m.l.s. schedule in late july and early august to travel to london to play in the emirates cup against arsenal.
